description:
Piyo-tan is angry when Nya-tan ridicules her beloved hobby. Nya-tan gets cocky and challenges her to a Sol/Lull Seal battle, and Piyo-tan chooses the battle method... but Nya-tan has no idea what the rules are, so she begs Takeru to train her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Beauty of Flowers, Bird Steps, and Moon
